aboutBody:
Hi, I'm Jules. I've been cooking professionally for over 10 years, working in restaurants and now as a private chef. I love creating personalized dining experiences that bring people together around great food.

I specialize in French and Mediterranean cuisine, but I'm happy to work with any style or dietary requirements. Every menu is customized to your preferences and the occasion.

services.title: Private Dinners
services.description: Intimate dinner parties at your home. I handle everything from shopping to cleanup.

services.title: Special Events
services.description: Birthdays, anniversaries, and celebrations. Custom menus for your special day.

services.title: Weekly Meals
services.description: Healthy, prepared meals for the week. Perfect for busy families or individuals.

services.title: Cooking Classes
services.description: Learn to cook in your own kitchen. Great for date nights or group activities.

menuItems.description: Chocolate soufflé with vanilla ice cream

testimonials.quote: Chef Jules transformed our anniversary dinner into an unforgettable experience. The attention to detail and personalized menu exceeded all expectations.
testimonials.author: Sarah & Michael

testimonials.quote: The corporate dinner was a huge success. Chef Jules handled everything professionally, from dietary restrictions to wine pairings.
testimonials.author: Jennifer Chen

testimonials.quote: Weekly meal prep has changed our lives. Fresh, healthy, and delicious meals that make eating well effortless.
testimonials.author: David Rodriguez
